name: Snake Sweeper
description:
Minesweeper and Snake mash-up game in an underground setting!

Controls

  • wasd/arrows = move
  • space/lmb = mine
  • shift/rmb = place planks
  • alt+enter = toggle fullscreen

Credits

  • MythicalWaterStone - @mythical_water - mythicalwater.net
  • SporkTank - @TankSpork - sporktank.com
